body_html: Each bazel test invocation is a separate process, so when the process exits, it does release the memory. In this case, bazel is running multiple tests in parallel. Use bazel test -j 1 to only run one at a time.
body_text: Each bazel test invocation is a separate process, so when the process exits, it does release the memory.  In this case, bazel is running multiple tests in parallel.  Use bazel test -j 1 to only run one at a time.
body: Each bazel test invocation is a separate process, so when the process exits, it does release the memory.  In this case, bazel is running multiple tests in parallel.  Use bazel test -j 1 to only run one at a time.
